actions.description: The firenewt makes three Morningstar or Fire Ray attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) fire damage.
actions.name: Fire Ray

actions.description:
The firenewt casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
At will: guidance, light, mage armor, mage hand, prestidigitation
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: The firenewt can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the firenewt's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.
specialTraits.name: Imix's Blessing
